questions.quote: Just because you have someone's spare keys, it doesn't entitle you to break into their apartment. That's the reason you took away Kramer's keys.
They were mailboxes, you idiot. I didn't have the heart to tell you.
No, to tell you the truth, I was thinking of buying my father a new car.
So he gets out of the car, I say, "Hey buddy! I saw you hit that car!" So he says to me, "What are ya gonna do about it?"
So now you want an apology for the apology, plus the original apology?
That's good, then I get the apartment for at least one night. You know I'm paying for this whole Paris trip it's their anniversary present.
No, no, I don't think I'm special. My mother always said I'm not special.
Oh man. What is with this bar? It's right in my back. It's killing me.
George, I listened to your arguments, and they were rambling and flimsy. I'm not convinced. Come on, get dressed and let's get some dinner.
Okay, I'll talk to him. But you're putting me in a very difficult position.
